member.name: T:NativeLibraryUtilities.NativeDelegateInitializer
member.summary: This class contains methods to initialize delegates

member.name: M:NativeLibraryUtilities.NativeDelegateInitializer.SetupNativeDelegate(NativeLibraryUtilities.ILibraryInformation,System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Loads and setups a native delegate.
member.param: The native function name to load
The type of delegate to create
member.returns: A delegate that will call the native function

member.name: M:NativeLibraryUtilities.NativeDelegateInitializer.SetupNativeDelegates``1(NativeLibraryUtilities.ILibraryInformation)
member.summary: Sets up all native delegate in the type passed as the generic parameter
member.typeparam: The type to setup the native delegates in
member.param: The object containing the native library to load from

member.name: M:NativeLibraryUtilities.NativeDelegateInitializer.GetNativeDelegateList``1
member.summary: Gets a list of all all native delegates in the type passed as the generic parameter
member.typeparam: The type to setup the native delegates in
member.returns: A list of all native delegates that are being requested

member.name: M:NativeLibraryUtilities.NativeDelegateInitializer.GetNativeDelegateList(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets a list of all all native delegates in the type passed as the generic parameter
member.param: The type to setup the native delegates in
member.returns: A list of all native delegates that are being requested

member.name: T:NativeLibraryUtilities.NativeLibraryLoader
member.summary: This class handles loading of a native library

member.name: M:NativeLibraryUtilities.NativeLibraryLoader.CheckIsRoboRio
member.summary: Checks if the current system is a roboRIO
member.returns: True if running on a roboRIO

member.name: M:NativeLibraryUtilities.NativeLibraryLoader.AddLibraryLocation(NativeLibraryUtilities.OsType,System.String)
member.summary: Add a file location to be used when automatically searching for a library to load
member.param: The OsType to associate with the file
The file to load on that OS

member.name: M:NativeLibraryUtilities.NativeLibraryLoader.LoadNativeLibrary``1(NativeLibraryUtilities.ILibraryLoader,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Loads a native library using the specified loader and file
member.typeparam: The type containing the native resource, if it is embedded.
member.param: The file location. Can be either an embedded resource, or a direct file location
True to load the file directly from disk, otherwise false to extract from embedded
The location to extract to if the file is embedded. On null, it extracts to a temp file

member.name: M:NativeLibraryUtilities.NativeLibraryLoader.LoadNativeLibrary``1(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Loads a native library using the specified file. The OS is determined automatically
member.typeparam: The type containing the native resource, if it is embedded.
member.param: The file location. Can be either an embedded resource, or a direct file location
True to load the file directly from disk, otherwise false to extract from embedded
The location to extract to if the file is embedded. On null, it extracts to a temp file

member.name: M:NativeLibraryUtilities.NativeLibraryLoader.LoadNativeLibrary``1(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Loads a native library, using locations added using
member.typeparam: The type containing the native resource, if it is embedded.
member.param: True to load the file directly from disk, otherwise false to extract from embedded
The location to extract to if the file is embedded. On null, it extracts to a temp file

member.name: M:NativeLibraryUtilities.NativeLibraryLoader.LoadNativeLibraryFromReflectedAssembly(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads a native library with a reflected assembly holding the native libraries
member.param: The name of the assembly to reflect into and load from
True to force a local load on the RoboRIO
